param.name: username
param.description: (REQUIRED) The name of the calling user

param.name: info
param.description: (OPTIONAL) If 'true', return the debug info string which was constructed

param.name: mock
param.description: (OPTIONAL) If 'true', return the configured mock response

param.name: mockError
param.description: (OPTIONAL) If 'true', return the configured mockError response
